General.Name: Chasys
General.Description: CHASYS Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells automotive chassis systems and rear axles in South Korea and internationally. Its products comprise front suspension systems, such as sub frames, and center members and impact beams; rear suspension systems, including modules, axles, and crossmembers; arms/links; trailer hitches; and other products. The company was formerly known as Samlip Precision Co., Ltd. and changed its name to CHASYS Co., Ltd. in December 2002. CHASYS Co., Ltd. was founded in 1989 and is based in Gyeongsan, South Korea.
